More examplesFewer examplesAdd 1–2 tsp. chilli powder.Sprinkle 2 tsp. of brown sugar on top of each tart.Use 1 tsp of wholegrain mustard.Throw in about 2 tsp chopped thyme for some extra flavour.Mix 1 tsp dried yeast with 500ml warm water in a large bowl.Add 1 t. vanilla.
